game_description: Crazy Cook® is a fun and crazy cooking game for the whole family ! Your goal is to create great recipes…with a twist : the ingredients are a bit hostile ! Are you ready to slice flying pigs with a huge knife ? (workshop 1) Peel or block smiling oignons with a peeler ? (workshop 2) Smash crazy tomatoes with a hammer ? (workshop 3) Shoot jumping chickens with a salt mill ?(workshop 4) 10 recipes with 4 workshops each are included : that's 40 ways to have crazy fun ! Crazy Cook is in early acces. It's only the beginning ! We will soon add 2 new workshops (Pistol shooting and baking). We'll also add new features, new songs, new recipes and new tools ! Stay tuned. Thank you for purchasing the game in early acces. It means the world !
review_1: Art is good but the programming is bad. Which means slashing is not satisfying. Framerate is too low. Just a poorly made game.
review_2: Design is great. Lot's of fun with the fam.
